mc.name: Abolish
mc.oracleText:
You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText:
You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

mc.name: Aether Spellbomb

{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Release that which was never caged."
--Spellbomb inscription

Flash; convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.

When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.

mc.name: Arcbound Worker
mc.oracleText: Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it's put into a graveyard, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
mc.printedText: Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it's put into a graveyard, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
mc.flavorText: The parts are as strong as the whole.

mc.name: Argivian Restoration
mc.oracleText: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
mc.printedText: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
mc.flavorText:
"The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Assembly-Worker
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: With their factories long destroyed, some of Mishra's creations still toil in remote areas, endlessly performing and reperforming their last orders.

mc.name: Blinding Beam
mc.oracleText:
Choose one -- Tap two target creatures; or creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step.
Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
mc.printedText:
Choose one -- Tap two target creatures; or creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step.
Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

mc.name: Burrenton Bombardier
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Reinforce 2--{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Reinforce 2--{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
mc.flavorText: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and--with a little luck--a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

mc.name: Catapult Master
mc.oracleText: Tap five untapped Soldiers you control: Exile target creature.
mc.printedText: Tap five untapped Soldiers you control: Exile target creature.
mc.flavorText: "There's no 'I' in 'team,' but there's a 'we' in 'weapon.'"

Flying

Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying

mc.name: Crusade
mc.oracleText: White creatures get +1/+1.
mc.printedText: White creatures get +1/+1.
mc.flavorText:
"Finally, I understand. Home isn't where you rest. It's what you fight for."
--Elspeth Tirel

mc.name: Darksteel Citadel

Darksteel Citadel is indestructible. ("Destroy" effects and lethal damage don't destroy it.)

mc.printedText: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

mc.name: Elite Vanguard
mc.flavorText: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

mc.name: Elixir of Immortality
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into your library.
mc.flavorText:
"Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."
--Baron Sengir

mc.name: Frogmite
mc.oracleText: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
mc.printedText: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
mc.flavorText: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

mc.name: Glory Seeker
mc.flavorText: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."

mc.name: Goldmeadow Harrier
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest."
--Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

mc.name: Infantry Veteran
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
mc.flavorText: The mighty city of An Karras, with its rich history, built over thousands of years, fell in three hours.

mc.printedText: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

mc.name: Loyal Sentry
mc.oracleText: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.
mc.printedText: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.
mc.flavorText: "My cause is simple: To stop you, at any cost, from ever seeing the inside of this keep."

mc.name: Master of Etherium

Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
mc.printedText:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.

mc.flavorText: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

mc.name: Mighty Leap

mc.printedText: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

mc.name: Saltblast
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
mc.flavorText: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

mc.name: Seasoned Marshal
mc.oracleText: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
mc.printedText: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
mc.flavorText: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

mc.name: Seat of the Synod

(Seat of the Synod isn't a spell.)
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Serrated Biskelion

mc.printedText: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Whereas I was created to protect, the biskelion was created to destroy."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Silver Myr
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mc.flavorText:
"The world is already run by all manner of machines. One day, they'll remind us of that fact."
--Sargis Haz, artificer

mc.name: Steel Wall
mc.oracleText: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
mc.printedText: Defender
mc.flavorText:
"We sculpt the land into what we need--homes, armament, fortresses of war. Our strength comes not only from knowing, but from commanding the terrain."
--Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha

mc.name: Sunlance
mc.oracleText: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.
mc.printedText: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.
mc.flavorText:
"It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power."
--Orim, Samite inquisitor

mc.name: Swell of Courage

new puddles."

mc.name: Swords to Plowshares
mc.oracleText: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
mc.printedText: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
mc.flavorText: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

mc.name: Synod Centurion
mc.oracleText: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.
mc.printedText: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.
mc.flavorText:
"We order them to stand, they stand. We order them to wait, they wait. We order them to die, they die."
--Pontifex, elder researcher

mc.name: Temple Acolyte
mc.oracleText: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

mc.name: Tezzeret the Seeker
mc.oracleText:
+1: Untap up to two target artifacts.
-X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
-5: Artifacts you control become 5/5 artifact creatures until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
+1: Untap up to two target artifacts.
-X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
-5: Artifacts you control become 5/5 artifact creatures until end of turn.

mc.name: Thirst for Knowledge
mc.oracleText: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
mc.printedText: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
mc.flavorText: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."

mc.name: Thoughtcast
mc.oracleText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Draw two cards.
mc.printedText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Draw two cards.
mc.flavorText: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

mc.name: Trinket Mage

mc.printedText: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Trip Noose
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
mc.flavorText: A taut slipknot trigger is the only thing standing between you and standing.

mc.name: Triskelion
